analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.stanfordnlp.StanfordParser
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: printTagSet
configurationParameter.description: Write the tag set(s) to the log when a model is loaded.

configurationParameter.name: language
configurationParameter.description: Use this language instead of the document language to resolve the model and tag set mapping.

configurationParameter.name: modelVariant
configurationParameter.description: Variant of a model the model. Used to address a specific model if here are multiple models for one language.

configurationParameter.name: modelLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location from which the model is read.

configurationParameter.name: POSMappingLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location of the mapping file for part-of-speech tags to UIMA types.

configurationParameter.name: ConstituentMappingLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location of the mapping file for constituent tags to UIMA types.

configurationParameter.name: writeDependency
configurationParameter.description:
Sets whether to create or not to create dependency annotations.

Default: true

configurationParameter.name: mode
configurationParameter.description:
Sets the kind of dependencies being created.

Default: DependenciesMode#COLLAPSED TREE

configurationParameter.name: writeConstituent
configurationParameter.description:
Sets whether to create or not to create constituent tags. This is required for POS-tagging and lemmatization.

Default: true

configurationParameter.name: writePennTree
configurationParameter.description:
If this parameter is set to true, each sentence is annotated with a PennTree-Annotation, containing the whole parse tree in Penn Treebank style format.

Default: false

configurationParameter.name: annotationTypeToParse
configurationParameter.description:
This parameter can be used to override the standard behavior which uses the Sentence annotation as the basic unit for parsing.

If the parameter is set with the name of an annotation type x, the parser will no longer parse Sentence-annotations, but x-Annotations.

Default: null

configurationParameter.name: writePOS
configurationParameter.description:
Sets whether to create or not to create POS tags. The creation of constituent tags must be turned on for this to work.

Default: false

configurationParameter.name: readPOS
configurationParameter.description:
Sets whether to use or not to use already existing POS tags from another annotator for the parsing process.

Default: true

configurationParameter.name: maxTokens
configurationParameter.description:
Maximum number of tokens in a sentence. Longer sentences are not parsed. This is to avoid out of memory exceptions.

Default: 130

configurationParameter.name: maxItems
configurationParameter.description:
Controls when the factored parser considers a sentence to be too complex and falls back to the PCFG parser.

Default: 200000

configurationParameter.name: ptb3Escaping
configurationParameter.description: Enable all traditional PTB3 token transforms (like -LRB-, -RRB-).

configurationParameter.name: quoteBegin
configurationParameter.description: List of extra token texts (usually single character strings) that should be treated like opening quotes and escaped accordingly before being sent to the parser.

configurationParameter.name: quoteEnd
configurationParameter.description: List of extra token texts (usually single character strings) that should be treated like closing quotes and escaped accordingly before being sent to the parser.
